definition: erhua variant of 勁|劲[jin4]
stalwart/sturdy/strong/powerful
strength/energy/enthusiasm/spirit/mood/expression/interest/CL:把[ba3]/Taiwan pr. [jing4]
child/son
non-syllabic diminutive suffix/retroflex final
erhua variant of 一個勁|一个劲[yi1 ge4 jin4]
to dash/to put on a spurt/to redouble efforts
erhua variant of 加勁|加劲[jia1 jin4]
erhua variant of 不對勁|不对劲[bu4 dui4 jin4]
erhua variant of 使勁|使劲[shi3 jin4]
to extend/to put forth
erhua variant of 可勁|可劲[ke3 jin4]
chewiness
erhua variant of 對勁|对劲[dui4 jin4]
dash/pep/vigor
firmness of determination
erhua variant of 死勁|死劲[si3 jin4]
erhua variant of 沒勁|没劲[mei2 jin4]
erhua variant of 犟勁|犟劲[jiang4 jin4]
erhua variant of 省勁|省劲[sheng3 jin4]

sentences.english: Some 28 percent of adolescents say they are too tired to exercise, due to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 28%的年輕人表示，由於睡眠不足而沒勁兒運動。

sentences.english: His mouth continued to twitch unspeaking in nervous curls of disdain.
sentences.chinese: 嘴脣卻一個勁兒地抽搐着，顯示出神經質的嘲諷。

sentences.english: That youngster works with a will.
sentences.chinese: 這小夥子幹活有股傻勁兒。

sentences.english: The mallards seemed like the colder it was the better in the pond.
sentences.chinese: 池中野鴨是愈冷愈遊得起勁兒。

sentences.english: This hoe suits me very well .
sentences.chinese: 這把鋤我使着很對勁兒。

sentences.english: They have been getting along quite well.
He squeezed his nose, closed his mouth, and blew really hard.
sentences.chinese: 他擠擠鼻子，合上嘴，並且使勁兒吹。

sentences.english: That young girl Hun however don't feel, waving hand of a strength son.
sentences.chinese: 那少女渾然未覺，一個勁兒的揮手。

sentences.english: This is the novel to the all-pervasive fine Jiner.
sentences.chinese: 小說要的就是這種無孔不入的細勁兒。
這時，有人使勁兒把我搖醒。

sentences.english: It’s not just all the craziness in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 這股瘋狂勁兒可不只存在於中東。

sentences.english: Jolly him up and get the job done.
sentences.chinese: 給他鼓鼓勁兒，把工作做完。

sentences.english: Alice said to herself, as well as she could for sneezing.
sentences.chinese: 愛麗絲費勁兒地對自己說，並不停地打着噴嚏。

sentences.english: I like your down-to-earth and hardworking spirit.
sentences.chinese: 我就喜歡你們這股紮紮實實埋頭苦幹的勁兒。

sentences.english: He heard it numbly, a little amazed at his audacity.
sentences.chinese: 他自己也聽得一呆，對自己的莽撞勁兒有點喫驚。

definition: erhua variant of 點|点[dian3]
to exert all one's strength
strength/CL:把[ba3]
all over/from head to foot
hurriedly/without delay
to open one's mouth (to speak, esp. to make a request)/to gape
just now/a moment ago
at once/immediately/promptly/swiftly
(typically followed by 就[jiu4]) apt to (lose one's temper, catch a cold etc)/at the drop of a hat
to play/to have fun/to hang out
past one's prime/has-been
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
not in good condition/wrong/fishy
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
unimportant/not serious/it doesn't matter/never mind/it looks all right, but
